eu.trentorise.smartcampus.osm.android.http

Class HttpClientFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.trentorise.smartcampus.osm.android.http.HttpClientFactory

  • public class HttpClientFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    Factory class for creating an instance of HttpClient. The default implementation returns an instance of DefaultHttpClient. In order to use a different implementation call setFactoryInstance(IHttpClientFactory) early in your code, for example in onCreate in your main activity. For example to use OkHttp/ use the following code HttpClientFactory.setFactoryInstance(new IHttpClientFactory() { public HttpClient createHttpClient() { return new OkApacheClient(); } });
